children.value: This is useful, because plants require pollen of the same species to propagate.  While other bees may introduce pollen from different plant species, the honeybee guarantees pollination by the same species, because it moves from flower to flower of the same plant type, cross-pollinating and causing fertilisation and seed production. Bees are so critical link to the pollination cycle, that studies have linked the decline of certain flora to the decline of specific bee species.
